content: this free crochet baby blanket pattern is an easy way to practice your moss and puff stitches plus an opportunity to give a sentimental hand-made gift to a little loved one finish off the blanket with a border in front and back post double crochets designed by hannah at daisy farm crafts the red heart gold puffs baby blanket works up with red heart super saver giving you 120 shade options to play with ~~~~~ size approx 35 x 38 89 x 96 5 cm red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m saffron 0234 4 balls size u s h/8 5 mm crochet hook gauge 16 sts and 20 row = 4 10 cm in moss st pat ~~~~~ available on yarnspirations here 1 https //daisyfarmcrafts com/crochet-gold-puffs-baby-blanket/
